Cost of force and stores for 4 months, - 42,486 64
Add the 10 per cent, as above, - - 9,398 66
Total cost of opening Pass-a-1'Outre, - $51,885 30
Or for opening both Passes, the cost will be $155,270
60, or about 151 cents per cubic yard for opening.
After the Passes are once opened effectively, it is presumable that smaller boats and lighter machinery will be sufficient to keep them open. At all events, it will only be necessary to act upon the bars occasionally, which can be done
fuel will effect a great reduction of the monthly cost. It
must be understood, however, that this harrowing and scraping must be a constant operation, in order to be perfectly
successful, as must also be any other plan in its application
to the Passes of the Mississippi river.
Very respectfully, your ob't servant,
J. K. DUNCAN, Civil Engineer,
